snippet.title: Haunted Hotel: Eclipse
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/WmSMYJ

You and your renowned partner James have been called to investigate a strange disturbance at a hotel, but the maid says the guests are all monsters. What’s happened here, and does she really mean that literally?

•JOIN THE BATTLE FOR HUMANITY
It will all come down to this fight to the death on a full moon. The hotel may not look like much, but the fate of the world will be decided here.

•INVESTIGATE SOME VERY STRANGE MURDERS
Things are a bit odd at the Final Journey Hotel. You’ll need to discover who’s behind the murders of a vampire, a werewolf, and a mysterious baron. 

•CAN YOU CRACK THIS IMPORTANT CASE?
You and James have solved many cases, but this could be your most vital. You don’t have much time. Get to work finding those clues!

•UNCOVER MORE SECRETS IN THE BONUS GAME!
Discover great extras by unlocking this fantastic Collector’s Edition.  Experience the bonus chapters and enjoy the gorgeous wallpapers and concept art in the otherworldly Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure!
